name: bootstrap
description: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.
author: The Bootstrap Authors (https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/graphs/contributors)

scripts.css-compile-docs: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/docs.scss assets/css/docs.min.css
scripts.js-minify-docs: uglifyjs --config-file build/uglifyjs.config.json --output assets/js/docs.min.js assets/js/vendor/anchor.min.js assets/js/vendor/clipboard.min.js assets/js/vendor/holder.min.js assets/js/src/application.js assets/js/src/pwa.js
scripts.js-test-cloud: ruby -r webrick -e "s = WEBrick::HTTPServer.new(:Port => 3000, :DocumentRoot => Dir.pwd, :Logger => WEBrick::Log.new('/dev/null'), :AccessLog => []); trap('INT') { s.shutdown }; s.start" & grunt saucelabs-qunit
scripts.docs-github: shx echo 'github: true' > $npm_config_tmp/twbsconfig.yml && npm run docs-compile -- --config _config.yml,$npm_config_tmp/twbsconfig.yml && shx rm $npm_config_tmp/twbsconfig.yml
scripts.maintenance-dependencies: ncu -a -x jquery && npm update && bundle update && shx echo 'Manually update assets/js/vendor/*, js/tests/vendor/*, bower.json and .travis.yml'
scripts.release-zip: cd dist/ && zip -r9 bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist.zip * && shx mv bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist.zip ..
scripts.prerelease: lerna run test && lerna run build
